Actual Results: Not in proper format and also map is not showing

Pre-Condition: User is logged in and on the "My Account" section
Expected Results: The address should be saved and shown in the account section
Actual Results:
On clicking “Save Address” with invalid data, error appears.
On navigating back to the address section or due to auto-refresh, entire form resets and input is lost.
